duties_responsibilities.duty: Stock shelves, refill displays, load and move heavy products, and unload trucks.
Maintain department cleanliness and organization, apply product knowledge, and ensure compliance with established procedures.
Assist customers in locating products and answering product questions.
Work overnight shifts, including weekends and holidays, and perform physically demanding tasks.

education_certification.credential: Minimum age 18, experience in stocking and customer service preferred.
